strategy.name: set-statistics
strategy.description:
Sets the 'statistics' level.
E.g. <set-statistics>4 sets the statistics level to 4.

strategy.name: get-statistics
strategy.description: Give the current 'statistics' level. Default is 0.

strategy.name: pass-statistics
strategy.description:
Builds command-line parameter for 'statistics' levels for calling XT tools.
E.g. xtc-transform(!"abox2text", pass-statistics ) passes the 'statistics' level to abox2text.
